Murid Disiram air Keras, Kepsek SMPN 229 Kebon Jeruk Minta Polisi Usut Pelaku
07 Nov 2019, 14:03 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Seorang siswi SMPN 229 Kebon Jeruk Jakbar berinisial A disiram air kelas oleh orang tidak dikenal. Kepsek SMPN 229 Kebon Jeruk Ruhadi pun meminta polisi mengusut tuntas pelaku tersebut.
"Ya mudah-mudahan kasus ini bisa diusut sampai tuntas ketemu yang menyiram tersebut," ujar Ruhadi di kantornya, Kebon Jeruk, Jakarta Barat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ruhadi merasa prihatin atas kejadian yang menimpa siswinya itu. Ia menyebutkan, bahwa saat kejadian pada Selasa (5/11) sore, A baru pulang sekolah.
"Sore itu betul di sini ada kegiatan ekstrakurikuler bidang Paskibra itu dimulai sekitar jam 3.00 sorean sampai 04.30 sore. Kemudian selesai dan anak-anak pulang itu. Jadi selama kegiatan di sini nggak ada masalah itu, sampai selesai nggak ada masalah di sini," katanya.
Ruhadi baru mendapatkan kabar bahwa A mengalami penyiraman air keras selepas pukul 18.00 WIB. Ruhadi mengatakan saat ini kasus itu masih ditangani Polsek Kebon Jeruk.
"Ya sangat prihatin. Jadi anak-anak kita didik di sini dengan segala jerih payah baik melalui sikap dan sebagianya. Kemudian selalu kita jaga dari pagi sampai sore bahkan sampai malem teman-teman kami guru-guru kami betul-betul menjaga anak. Jadi ternyata kita tidak tahu bahwa di luar sana ada musibah yang bisa mengancam setiap orang," paparnya.

Students Doused with Hard Water, Principal of SMPN 229 Kebon Jeruk Asks the Police to Investigate the Actor
Nov 7 2019, 14:03 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - A student of SMP 229 Kebon Jeruk West Jakarta with the initials A is doused with class water by unknown people. Principal of SMPN 229 Kebon Jeruk Ruhadi also asked the police to fully investigate the perpetrators.
"Yes, hopefully this case can be thoroughly investigated to meet the watering," said Ruhadi in his office, Kebon Jeruk, West Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Ruhadi was concerned about what had happened to his student. He mentioned, that during the incident on Tuesday (11/5) afternoon, A had just returned from school.
"That afternoon, it was true that there was an extracurricular activity in the Paskibra field starting around 3.00 in the afternoon until 04.30 in the afternoon. Then it was finished and the children returned home. .
Ruhadi just got the news that A experienced a hard watering after 18.00 WIB. Ruhadi said that the case was still being handled by the Kebon Jeruk Sector Police.
"Yes, we are very concerned. So our children are educated here with all the hard work both through attitude and part of it. Then we always take care of it from morning to evening, even to evening, our friends, our teachers really take care of children. So it turns out we don't know that there are disasters out there that can threaten everyone, "he explained.
